sections.heading: 2 through 10 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the "School Protection Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 2013, 1st Ex. Sess., c. 7, ยง 2, emerg. eff. Sept. 10, 2013.NOTE: Text formerly resided under repealed Title 70, ยง 6-140, which was derived from Laws 2009, c. 228, ยง 75, which was held unconstitution
